mapper.insert: insert into bill (totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, itemcode, isPrint, feecode, isDone, billcat) values (#{totalprice}, #{pid}, #{count}, now(), #{isPaid}, #{itemcode}, #{isPrint}, #{feecode}, #{isDone}, #{billcat})
mapper.sql: select billid, totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, b.itemcode, isPrint, b.feecode, isDone, billcat, nm.itemname as itemname, f.feename as feename from bill b join non_medic nm on nm.itemcode = b.itemcode join fee f on f.feecode = b.feecode
mapper.update: update bill set isPaid = true where billid = #{billId}
